Package com.nagarro.inputoutput

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddMoreItems
    This class controls the process of asking user whether he wants to add more items to the bill
    BillDisplay
    This class displays all the orders of a user
    DisplayError
    This class acts as a view to display any errors made by the user during input
    UserInput
    This class takes the input of the item from the user
